abstract: HSBC, Standard Chartered and CIMB Group are among potential bidders for a 42 percent stake in unprofitable BankThai, which is partially owned by TPG, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: HSBC, Standard Chartered and CIMB Group are among potential bidders for a 42 percent stake in unprofitable BankThai, which is partially owned by TPG, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Bidders Said to Line Up for BankThai Stake
